en.title: Freejoas
en.description: Freejoas is web app designed for mobile that allows users to find and share free feijoa in their area. Users can post photos, locations and descriptions of free feijoa they would like to share with peope, and others can claim them.

en.title: Arcade Shooter
en.description: This is a simple 2D arcade shooter game. The player controls a spaceship and shoots down enemy ships. This game was a school project and created as a learning project to practice game development in Unity and the SCRUM framework.

en.title: Flatties
en.description: Flatties is a web app that helps people find and share rental properties. The app is designed to make the process of finding a flatmate and a rental property easier. The system would help people arrange house viewing appointment, and provide a platform for communication between potential flatmates and landlords. The app is currently in the early stages of development and is being built as a learning project to practice full-stack web development.
